original_title: Non si deve profanare il sonno dei morti
overview: When a series of murders hit the remote English countryside, a detective suspects a pair of travelers when it is actually the work of the undead, jarred back to life by an experimental ultra-sonic radiation machine used by the Ministry of Agriculture to kill insects.
tagline: They tampered with nature—now they must pay the price …
title: The Living Dead at Manchester Morgue
